MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH1 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Gladstone Avenue, Sealand Road, Vernon Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25AM on 14th January 2021.
